amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the funds available for State and Local Programs with the Federal Emergency Management Agency by $412,908,000 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the State and Local Programs with the Federal Emergency Management Agency by $412,908,000 and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A021) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A021) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A021) offered by Mr. Flake.
